edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.PlanningPoker.views

Class DatePicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.PlanningPoker.views.DatePicker

  • public class DatePicker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains an interactive calendar to select when a Planning Poker session is to begin and end.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Miguel (Code), Christian (Comments)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatePicker

        public DatePicker(javax.swing.JPanel box,
          javax.swing.JTextField text)
        Sets up a blank calendar from today's current date. Sets up action listeners that for a user to click one of the dates, and then displays it. Advances calendar pages by months with user input.
        Parameters:
        box - The panel on which the calendar is displayed
        text - The text field for the date.

    • Method Detail

      • displayDate

        public void displayDate()
        Displays a date on-screen corresponding to the date the user has selected. Ensures that the date of the planning poker session is in the future.

      • formatPickedDate

        public java.lang.String formatPickedDate()
        Formats the user picked date as Day/Month/Year with the time.
        Returns:
        String

      • close

        public void close()
        the method is used to close the date picker

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the deck model
        Parameters:
        enabled - whether to enable or disable the DatePicker
